result.pre: an additional intraligand CT state of singlet parentage (substantiated by
result.post: calculations), which undergoes ultrafast charge recombination competing with CSS

result.pre: and pump–pump–probe spectroscopy combined with electron transfer theory and simple
result.post: calculations provides a clear picture of important CSS properties.

result.pre: V. S. D'Souza F. Poddutoori P. K. J. Phys. Chem.
